The Myanmar Fed Cup team represents Myanmar in Fed Cup tennis competition and are governed by the Tennis Federation of Myanmar.  They currently compete in the Asia/Oceania Zone of Group II.
History
Myanmar competed in its first Fed Cup in 1976.  Their best result was reaching World Group II in 2005 and 2006.
Current team (2025)
